Salary Home Rent
Food Travel Bills Car and Bike Cloth Eat out Phone Entertain Rent Gift Health Pet Sports Electronics Saving Income Tax
Help Me Remind Me
All the data\'s shown in the app is for this date or period of time. The arrow-buttons will allow you to see all the data\'s for the next or prev respective date.
You can change your default daywise view to monthly, yearly or weekly wise view and see your data\'s for your selected period of time. Even, you can directly see a particular date\'s data by using the SELECT option from the submenu. This shows all your datas for your specified period in simplest form. In the center of the chart, you can see your TOTAL-INCOME and TOTAL EXPENSE. The slices shows the PERCENTAGE of your expense been spend in a particular category. CLICK ON THE SLICES TO SEE THE DETAILS. This shows the balance i.e., ( YOUR INCOME FOR THE SPECIFIED PERIOD - YOUR EXPENSE FOR THE SPECIFIED PERIOD ). Tap on this to see the details. Per day expensable balance is the amount of money you can spent per day for this month. This is calculated in the formula :- ( TOTAL MONTHLY BALANCE/NO OF DAYS REMAINING FOR THE MONTH ). Tap on the bell icon in the menu bar. You will get a remainder dialog. Set the type of remainder (i.e. Weekly, daily, monthly), you want for getting notified on your specified time and day about your expenses. Checking the remind-me option will get you notified everyday 10 PM to add your expenses. This will search the category from the all group of categories including your custom added categoried. The most used 8 categories will be shown here always for your easier use. Just tap on the more button to see all available catgeories including your custom catgeories. You can even delete your added custom categories from the more dialog.
